other_tests.findings: Increased lymphocytes predominantly mature-appearing; protein level 162 mg/dl (normal range, 5–55); glucose level 35 mg/dl (normal range, 50–75); no malignant cells detected.
Mild nonspecific interstitial fibrosis without evidence of granulomas or cancer.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsy of the dura and brain

other_tests.findings: Compact, non-necrotizing granulomas occupying approximately 80% of the lymph-node tissue.
